modName: SBB - Slim Busty Body mesh and slider preset
summary: Mesh made with Caliente\'s BodySlide tool including the preset. Mixture of UNP and CBBE sizes.
descriptionHtml:
This is my current body mesh, made with Caliente\'s BodySlide tool. I wanted more of a UNP bottom with a CBBE type top half. This is what I ended up with, for now at least. Shoulders are a lot narrower aswell. The large end of the scale has breast a little bigger than CBBE at max, I tend to use the smallest setting on the weight slide leaving the other end of the scale for NPCs.

Update:
Reduced the breastsmall slider slightly at the max end, nothing else yet atmo. Will do some proper work on it with extended sliders etc once there are more armors for bodyslide.

Install:
The meshes can be install with NMM or manually by extracting to your skyrim folder.
The preset goes into your \'\\skyrim\\Data\\CalienteTools\\BodySlide\\SliderPresets\' folder and is under the \'CalienteBodyPlus\' body set.

You will need:
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

In the screenshot I am using:
CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
LustDesign - Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear - CBBE v3 - UNP by Lustrianna - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15804

All credit goes to Caliente for the fantastic Bodyslide tool and body meshes. 
I just fiddled with some sliders, though if this body is used in a mod a mention might be nice.
author: Iormangund
